Nerangs.ab: barsom sih ud sē tāg ud frāgām dō tāg barsom bastan ud parāhōm kardan sāzišn hamāg xūb frāz nihādan ud pad kamistīh sē tāg ud urwarām pārag-ē ud ǰām andak-ē frāz nihišn ud ān kas kē zōtīh kāmēd kardan aṣ̌əm vohū ēk guftan ud dast pad pādyāb kardan

"The barsom (consists of) 33 twigs and the frāgām are two. He should tie the barsom, prepare the parāhōm and dispose all the implements. He has to dispose the hōm, at least three twigs, and a branch of urwarām and a drop of ǰām. The one who wishes to perform in the office of zōt should recite one aṣ̌əm vohū and wash his hands with pādyāb."
